author: AP
title: Premier League clubs discuss plans to complete season
description: Premier League clubs have been discussing how the season can be completed when the government declares it safe for sports to resume
content:
Premier League clubs on Friday discussed how the season can be completed when the government declares it is safe for sports to resume during the coronavirus pandemic.
